mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) as totalCount, SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'PENDING' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as pendingCount, SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'ANSWERED' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as answeredCount FROM qna
SELECT q.id, q.title, q.created_at as createdAt, CASE WHEN q.file_id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as hasFile FROM qna q WHERE q.status = 'PENDING' ORDER BY q.created_at DESC LIMIT 5
